titleStmt.title: Thomas E. Bramlette to William T. Scott
CWG13812

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Horse Settlements, Salaries, Ins. Bureau, Gen. Receipts, Correspondence Regarding Troops; Right Stack

body.p:
Copy
STATE OF KENTUCKY
Office of Quartermaster General,
Frankfort, Ky. November 14th, 1865
Colonel W. T. Scott,

You will proceed to New York and receive the "Triplett" guns under Contract with Parker Snow & Co. of date Nov 1864, and have them shippped to Qr master Genl of Kenty. you will receive such guns as have been inspected and certified to be complete according to Contract. For the time you are necessarily absent, you are relieved from active duty as Paymaster General of Kentucky, to resume your duties upon return

"Signed"
Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky
